actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to further restrict the allowance as a deduction of entertainment, amusement, and recreation expenses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to disallow all deductions for entertainment, amusement, or recreation expenses or business meals.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to further restrict the allowance as a deduction of entertainment, amusement, and recreation expenses.
